item.title: We Wish You A Merry Christmas - Ukulele Play Along
item.description:
Ukulele play along - Christmas
We Wish You A Merry Christmas - Traditional
Using the chords: A Am B C D Em G
Suggested Strum Patterns: D D D or D DU DU
Website: http://ukulele.wales/ Ukulele Wales Channel: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCQxNRbyi3i4Nvqpo55bWBkg T-Shirts & Merch: https:https://www.redbubble.com/people/ukulaliens/shop
This video is meant for educational purposes.

item.title: Saxophone Dreamsound - Driving Home for Christmas
item.description:
Ukulele play along - Christmas
Driving Home For Christmas - Chris Rea
Using the chords: A Bm C#m7 D E7 Em F#m G I have simplified the chords to make the song accessible to more players. If you would prefer, you can replae the E7 chord tih an E and the C#m7 chord with a C#m.
Suggested Strum Patterns: D DU U DU
Website: http://ukulele.wales/ Ukulele Wales Channel: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCQxNRbyi3i4Nvqpo55bWBkg T-Shirts & Merch: https:https://www.redbubble.com/people/ukulaliens/shop
This video is meant for educational purposes.
No copyright infringement intended

item.title: Greg Lake - I Believe in Father Christmas
item.description:
Ukulele play along - Christmas
I Believe In Father Christmas - Greg Lake
Using the chords: A C D Dsus2 G G6
Suggested Strum Patterns: D DU D DU
Website: http://ukulele.wales/ Ukulele Wales Channel: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCQxNRbyi3i4Nvqpo55bWBkg T-Shirts & Merch: https:https://www.redbubble.com/people/ukulaliens/shop

item.title: Purple People Eater Ukulele Play Along With Key Changes
item.description:
For educational use. Optimized for GCEA Ukulele. Keys of D, Eb, E, and F.
Chords Used: D, G, A7, Eb, Ab, Bb7, E, A, B7, F, Bb, C7
As performed by Sheb Wooley.
Tutorial Video (GCEA & DGBE): https://youtu.be/l285RIIffvo
******************** Video created on the iPad Pro using Luma Fusion.
Check out the UkeStuff Podcast, where I talk about ukulele education and my own ukulele experiences. Available on Radio Public, Apple Podcasts, Google Play, Spotify, and Stitcher. If you don't have a podcast app, please check out Radio Public for all your podcasts--they support podcasters financially.

item.title: Ariana Grande - Santa Tell Me
item.description:
Ukulele play along - Christmas
Santa Tell Me - Ariana Grande Written by Ariana Grande, Ilya Salmanzadeh and Savan Kotecha
Using the chords: A B7 Bm C D Em G G7 Gmaj7
Suggested Strum Patterns: D DU D DU
Website: http://ukulele.wales/ Ukulele Wales Channel: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCQxNRbyi3i4Nvqpo55bWBkg T-Shirts & Merch: https:https://www.redbubble.com/people/ukulaliens/shop
This video is meant for educational purposes.
No copyright infringement intended

item.title: The Pogues - Fairytale of New York
item.description:
Ukulele play along - Christmas
Fairytale Of New York - The Pogues Featuring Kirsty MacColl
*** Clean radio edit version ***
Using the chords: A Bm D G
Suggested Strum Patterns: Single strums / D DU DU (fast)
I have add the strum pattern for the whole song as it changes throughout.
If D DU DU is too fast just play single strums for the amount eg. D DU DU x3 = D D D
Website: http://ukulele.wales/ Ukulele Wales Channel: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCQxNRbyi3i4Nvqpo55bWBkg T-Shirts & Merch: https:https://www.redbubble.com/people/ukulaliens/shop
This video is meant for educational purposes.
No copyright infringement intended

item.title: Scooby Doo Theme Song Ukulele Play Along (In A)
item.description:
For educational use. Optimized for GCEA ukulele. Key of A.
Chords Used: A, Bm, E, D, D#
Tutorial Video (GCEA & DGBE): https://youtu.be/R-w5qnNS0Uo
Video created on the iPad Pro using Luma Fusion. The ukulele chord font is available at ukefarm.com.
Do you have a request for a song to be made into a video? First, check the index of play alongs at www.ukeplayalongs.com to make sure your song isn't already available. If it isn't, please fill out this request form: https://forms.gle/84rgm7kFNJWnTqFB6

item.title: Lift Every Voice And Sing - Ukulele Play Along
item.description:
Lift Every Voice and Sing by the Abyssinian Baptist Church. It’s been lowered by 3 semitones so beginner ukulele students can play along. For educational use. Chords Used: C, F, A7, Dm, Bbdim, Dm, Gm, A, Bb, D, D7
If you found this video useful please subscribe. If you want to be notified of future videos please click on bell next to subscribe.
Do you have a request for a song to be made into a video? First, check the index of play along videos at www.ukeplayalongs.com to make sure your song isn't already available. If it isn't, please fill out this request form: https://forms.gle/84rgm7kFNJWnTqFB6. We cannot promise that a request will be made into a play along, but we do appreciate your recommendations!

item.title: Survivor - 'Rocky" Eye Of The Tiger
item.description:
For educational use. Optimized for GCEA ukulele. Key of Dm
Chords Used: Dm, C, A, Bb, F, Gm
As performed by Survivor.
Tutorial Video (GCEA & DGBE): https://youtu.be/tbjfpz8at8A

item.title: The Thanksgiving Song - Ukulele Play Along (no lyrics)
item.description:
**The same play along song, but with lyrics, may be found here - https://youtu.be/ch5pyySDpEs .
Now Thank We All Our God (Nun Danket), also known as the Thanksgiving Hymn or the Hymn of Thanksgiving. For educational use. Chords Used: C F Dm G G7 Am Em A
If you found this video useful please subscribe. If you want to be notified of future videos please click on bell next to subscribe.
